title: WHATWG URL Workstream-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by WHATWG URL Workstream

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL/pathname

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

URL.pathname

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

It is unclear whether you mean (A):

The pathname property of the URL interface is
(a string containing an initial / followed by the path of the URL, not including the query string or fragment)
(or the empty string if there is no path).

or (B):

The pathname property of the URL interface is
a string containing an initial / followed by
(the path of the URL, not including the query string or fragment (or the empty string if there is no path)).

What did you expect to see?

Clarification as to whether the pathname must always begin with a leading /, or if it permits the empty string.

In reading (A) above, it permits the empty string. In reading (B) above, it does not permit the empty string.

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

No response

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No response

MDN metadata

items.title: [url] URL.pathname ambiguous: does it permit or not permit the empty string?
